data.name: ReadAlert1
data.value: select top(1) CONTROL_NUMBER, NAME, MESSAGE, DESCRIPTION from CKT_ALERT with(readuncommitted) where CONTROL_NUMBER = 396

data.name: ReadAlert2
data.value: select top(1) CONTROL_NUMBER, NAME, MESSAGE, DESCRIPTION from CKT_ALERT with(readuncommitted) where CONTROL_NUMBER = 442

data.name: ReadAlert3
data.value: select top(1) CONTROL_NUMBER, NAME, MESSAGE, DESCRIPTION from CKT_ALERT with(readuncommitted) where CONTROL_NUMBER = 447

data.name: ReadDocument
data.value: select distinct NAME, TYPE, EFFECTIVE_DATE from CKT_DOCUMENT where TYPE = 'BTCH' order by NAME
